question: Which is the political capital of Burundi?
explanation: Gitega is the political capital of Burundi. It is located in the Burundian Central Plateau. Till the beginning of 2019, Bujumbura was the capital of Burundi. In 2019, Pierre Nkurunziza, the former President of Burundi, changed the capital from Bujumbura to Gitega. Kigali is the capital of Rwanda. Dodoma is the capital of Tanzania.
